column1: In W. A. Gamini v Attorney General CA/142/2009 the court held that:

column2: “the chain of stressful events in the troubled relationship of the accused
and  the  deceased  culminating  in  the  aforesaid  unfortunate  incident,  are
cumulative provocation because the accused retaliated at the spur of the
